casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 30, 2013

[Cite as 04/30/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-Ohio-1744.]

MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

2012- 1929. State ex rel. Phillips v. Hoover Ball & Bearing Co.

Franklin App. No. 11AP-829, 2012-Ohio-5148. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County.

Upon consideration of appellant’s application for dismissal, it is ordered by the court that the application for dismissal is granted. Accordingly, this cause is dismissed.
